example: the table is in the middle of the room
the man got up in the middle of the conversation and left
nl: middenin|midden in;;Write 'midden in' if it is followed by a noun or personal pronoun, otherwise write 'middenin'.

the table is in the middle of the room.en: The table is in the middle of the room.
nl: De tafel staat in het midden van de kamer.
De tafel staat midden in de kamer.

the man got up in the middle of the conv.fi: Mies nousi kesken keskustelun ja lähti pois.
the man got up in the middle of the conv.en: The man got up in the middle of the conversation and left.
the man got up in the middle of the conv.nl: De man stond op midden in het gesprek en vertrok.
